Literature.Title: De Novo Design of Antimicrobial Peptides With a Special Charge Pattern and Their Application in Combating Plant Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Chen EHL, Weng CW, Li YM, Wu MC, Yang CC, Lee KT, Chen RPY, Cheng CP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(IC50=10µg/ml),Xanthomonas euvesicatoria(IC50=2µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(IC50=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(IC50=10µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(IC50=20µg/ml)
